request_subject_line: Formal request for access to my personal information

industries.name: Telecommunications
industries.description: Your phone call records, web browsing history, geolocation, and device identifiers.

industries.name: Fitness Trackers
industries.description: Your heartbeat, sleeping patterns, diet, weight, walking habits, and general health.

industries.name: Dating Applications
industries.description: Your personality traits, sexual preferences, dating history, and other lifestyle information.

info_categories.name: Call logs
info_categories.description: E.g. numbers dialed, times and dates of calls, call durations, routing information, and any geolocational or cellular tower information associated with the calls)

info_categories.name: Mobile app data
info_categories.description: Information collected about me, or persons/devices associated with my account, using one of your company’s mobile device applications

info_categories.name: Geolocation data
info_categories.description: collected about me, my devices, and/or associated with my account (e.g. GPS information, cell tower information)

info_categories.name: IP address logs
info_categories.description: associated with me, my devices, and/or my account (e.g. IP addresses assigned to my devices/router, IP addresses or domain names of sites I visit and the times, dates, and port numbers)

info_categories.name: Disclosures to third parties
info_categories.description: Any information about disclosures of my personal information, or information about my account or devices, to other parties, including law enforcement and other state agencies

info_categories.name: Text & multimedia messages
info_categories.description: (sent and received, including date, time, and recipient information)

info_categories.name: Subscriber information
info_categories.description: that you store about me, my devices, and/or my account

info_categories.name: Other
info_categories.description: Any additional kinds of information that you have collected, retained, or derived from the telecommunications services or devices that I, or someone associated with my account, have transmitted or received using your company’s services

info_categories.name: Any additional kinds of information
info_categories.description: that you have collected, retained, or derived from the mobile or website services you provide, including by not limited to: data or records collected using my camera or from my camera roll; social networking information; data collected or retained derived from my microphone; or communications between myself and other users; contact book information;

info_categories.name: Personally identifying information
info_categories.description: that is unique to me, my devices, and/or my account, such as name, email addresses, phone numbers, responses to relationship questions, or device identifiers;

info_categories.name: Lifestyle information
info_categories.description: that you may have about me, such as drinking habits or sexual preference information.

info_categories.name: Health and fitness data
info_categories.description: including all records of my step activity, heart rate, sleep patterns, food intake.

info_categories.name: Any additional kinds of information
info_categories.description: that you have collected, retained, or derived from the mobile or website services your provide, or with the fitness-related device your company produces that I use
